item.title: Setting Up Hugo
item.description: Overview This is not intended to replace the hugo quick start page, however it will follow the same flow. All information here relates to my process in setting up hugo. Prerequisites Navigate to the hugo quick start page Install Hugo Install Git Git and GitBash were already installed prior to hugo setup. Installing Hugo Navigate to the hugo installation page for windows I opted for the extended edition of hugo Git was already installed Go was then installed in order to use Hugo Modules Dart Sass was not installed, but might be at a later time Go installation Page
